section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Insurance Ireland is the voice of insurance in Ireland respresenting the interests of both the domestic market and the international re/insurers and captive managers located in Ireland and transacting prefominantly non-domestic insurance and reinsurance business.
relevant_communication:
Various public relations activities including media releases and social media communications 
Various seminars, events and an annual International Insurance Conference 
Various publications including: 
•    Annual Report 
•    European insurance in figures and key facts 
•    How insurance stimulates growth 
•    How insurance works 
•    Indirect taxation on insurance contracts 
•    Insight briefings 
•    Insurance fraud 
•    Why insurers differ from banks
position: Head of European Affairs and International Insurance
